name: estrus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the time when a female animal is fertile (= able to become pregnant) and willing to mate (= have sex): The female panda is in estrus for only 24 to 48 hours per year. Just before the mother seal departs for the sea, she comes into oestrus and mates. See also
estrous cycleCompare
on heat UK
More examplesFewer examplesSuckling prevents cows from entering estrus.In a number of mammals, the vagina may be sealed when the animal is not sexually receptive and only open during oestrus.In many mammals, oestrus lasts a short time: just 48 hours in the mountain goat.
